document_data.name: Microcline
document_data.mainbody:
{{wikipedia article|Amazonite}}
'''Microcline''', sometimes referred to as '''amazonstone''' ([[wikipedia:en:amazonite|amazonite]]) in the ''Realms'', was a variety of [[feldspar]].{{Cite dragon/72/Gems Galore|16}}
document_data.Description: These [[ornamental stones]] were found in deep green to blue-green hues and cleaved easily so it took a skilled [[wikipedia:lapidarist|lapidarist]] to handle properly. Typically they are tumbled or cut cabochon. Polished microcline had a shimmer due to tiny cleavage cracks that reflected light. A typical stone had a base value of 10 gp.
document_data.Powers: Microcline could be used to make a substitute for [[squid]] and [[octopus]] [[ink]] that was the basis for many magical inks by grinding a microcline stone to powder and mixing it with the sap of a deciduous tree.
